name: avatar
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool initials_avatar.
Tool description: Generates initials avatar image from given name
API description: Generates an avatar with the initials derived from the given name and various customization options.

name.description: The name from which to derive the initials. Default is 'john doe'.

rounded.description: If True, the avatar will be rounded. Default is None.

uppercase.description: If True, the initials will be in uppercase. Default is None.

font_size.description: The font size of the initials, ranging from 0 to 1. Default is 0.

length.description: The number of initials to display. Default is 2.

size.description: The font size of the initials, ranging from 0 to 1. Default is 0.

background.description: The background color of the avatar in RRGGBB hex format. Default is '000000'.

color.description: The color of the initials in RRGGBB hex format. Default is 'ffffff'.
